item.description:
At this time, our February meeting will be a basic business meeting.

We'll also be discussing the direction for 2009. My feeling is our Fly-outs have been a big hit. Keeping them more family oriented and often. More in the summer than winter, but let's keep flying! There will be some changes this year and let's all get involved to make them what we want out of this club. We have an awesome group and everyone has agreed to pitch in one way or another....

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

See you all in February
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 February Meetup
